sentences: Tiny Vipers (born 1983) is the stage name of Jesy Fortino, an American acoustic musician from Seattle, Washington.
On January 20, 2012, it was announced that Fortino would be releasing a collaborative album with Grouper under the name
Mirrorring entitled Foreign Body on March 19, 2012.
Laughter was released on May 5, 2017 on Ba Da Bing Records while Fortino was studying to become an engineer.
Vocal samples and guitar on Orcas' self-titled album (LP, 2012)
